aka: Interview with Marshal Zhukov (Battle of Moscow)

cast.name: 康斯坦丁·西蒙诺夫 Konstantin Simonov
格奥尔吉·康斯坦丁诺维奇·朱可夫 Georgi Zhukov

trans_title: Interview with Marshal Zhukov (Battle of Moscow)
introduction: In this special episode dedicated to the 65th anniversary of the Great Patriotic War victory, Vladimir Pozner presents an interview by Konstantin Simonov with Marshal of the Soviet Union Georgi Zhukov, which was recorded on 5 August 1966 as part of the project Esli dorog tebe tvoy dom... (1967) but never released before. It was supposed to be destroyed for containing truth about the war, but Vladimir Pozner's father Vladimir Aleksandrovich Pozner, the creator of the production studio, managed to steal the reel and archive it in another studio, where it remains to this day.
